item.title: Leftism is just for comfortable white BernieBros who want a political club. Focusing on class automatically ignores race and gender.
item.description: Did systemic racism as we understand it today exist prior to Capitalism (mercantile or otherwise)? Racial categories were originally created to define an economic class: slaves. In addition, they served as an ideological tool to prevent poor whites from allying with Black people who actually share their class interests. Gender has also been used in order to regulate social roles. These aren’t separate systems of oppression that “occasionally” intersect; they are fundamentally interconnected.
